title: Lush Orchestral Soundtracks
description: A collection of 20 original orchestral compositions with a full and lush, symphonic sound. This music was created with state of the art samples and productions tools adhering to a AAA Hollywood cinematic level of quality.
longDescription:
A collection of 20 original orchestral compositions with a full and lush, symphonic sound. This music was created with state of the art samples and productions tools adhering to a AAA Hollywood cinematic level of quality.


Listen to sampler of the music


20 tracks included:

1. Ambient Violin Beauty 1:01

2. Beautiful Orchestral Wall 2:53

3. Beautiful Orchestral Wash 2:16

4. Beautiful Sadness and Hope 1:41

5. Beautiful Sunrise 1:51

6. Brass Fields 2:40

7. Calm Strings and Brass 2:13

8. Cheeky Brass March 1:26

9. Cinematic Harp and Strings 2:04

10. Dark Lush String Orchestra 2:53

11. Delicate Orchestral Beauty 2:26

12. Epic Brass March 0:50

13. Lush Orchestral Ambiance 3:56

14. Orchestral Requiem 1:38

15. Pastoral Moment 0:36

16. Pastoral 2:10

17. Proud Warm Brass 1:32

18. Pushing for Hope 3:52

19. Strings of the Deep 2:07

20. Warm Orchestra 1:35
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  20 original tracks
  •  AAA quality audio
  •  fast and responsive support
